import {Component} from '@angular/core'; import {AppBreadcrumbService} from '../app.breadcrumb.service'; import {AppComponent} from '../app.component'; @Component({ templateUrl: './app.invoice.component.html' }) export class AppInvoiceComponent { constructor(private breadcrumbService: AppBreadcrumbService, public app: AppComponent) { this.breadcrumbService.setItems([ {label: 'Pages'}, {label: 'Invoice', routerLink: ['/pages/invoice']} ]); } print() { window.print(); } }
